raw_body: Kamala Samaranayake. Beloved wife of late Dharmasiri,​ Samaranayake,​ loving mother of Palitha,​ Geethanjali,​ late Bharatha and Sobitha,​ beloved mother-in-law of Padma Samaranayake,​ Lal Yapa,​ Hemamala Samaranayake and Geethamali Samaranayake,​ passed away peacefully at her residence “Hema Mahal”,​ Kambuka,​ Gonapola junction. Cremation will take place on Monday 21st at 4.00 pm at Kumbuka General Cemetery.052492
